categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Izak Anzio was a male ranger from the Outer Rim world of Agamar. Anzio dreamed of seeing the galaxy, prompting him to enlist in the Galactic Empire's Imperial Academy program, where he became friends with Kreel, a fellow enlistee. On Anzio and Kreel's first mission together, however, Anzio was quickly killed by rebel mortars, never even making it off of the transport. Kreel reflected on Anzio and his death during the skirmish on the Ghost Moon, considering Anzio the only friend he'd ever had.
